channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light pole is leaning dangerously,, 1st September
item.description:
Traffic light pole is leaning dangerously and could fall on someone. Also, the lights are facing in the wrong direction now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 112, Maida Vale, Maida Vale, London

item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Urgent spillage removal required for disabled tenant, 1st September
item.description:
Dear Team, I am an Environment Champion and have just clean around 26 Waverley Road. I was informed that the resident is sick/disabled. The bin is overflowing on the pavement/road with an extremely bad smell. I would be grateful if the bin is collected as the rubbish seems to be clinical waste which is unhygienic to the public. Thank you in advance for your cooperation on this matter. Kind regards, Nina

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waverley Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
